    • Method Detail

      • getBill

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'Role.STUDENT\')")
@RequestMapping(produces="application/json",
                method=GET,
                value="/get/{courseRegistrationId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getBill​(@PathVariable
                                                       java.lang.Integer courseRegistrationId)
        Api to get Bill for payment made by course registration id
        Parameters:
        courseRegistrationId - id from registered courses to check bill
        Returns:
        Bill or student with courseRegistrationId given

      • approveCashPayment

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'Role.ADMIN\')")
@RequestMapping(produces="application/json",
                method=PUT,
                value="/approve/cash/{courseRegistrationId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity approveCashPayment​(@PathVariable
                                                                  java.lang.Integer courseRegistrationId)
        This API should only be authorized for Admins to approve cash payments
        Parameters:
        courseRegistrationId - id from registered courses to approve cash payments
        Returns:
        Http status for if payment is approved or not

      • payByCard

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'Role.STUDENT\')")
@RequestMapping(produces="application/json",
                method=PUT,
                value="/pay/card/{courseRegistrationId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity payByCard​(@RequestBody
                                                         CardDTO cardDTO,
                                                         @PathVariable
                                                         java.lang.Integer courseRegistrationId)
        This Api is used to make payment using card
        Parameters:
        cardDTO - Card Details to be entered from client
        courseRegistrationId - id from registered courses to pay the bill of student
        Returns:
        Response message and Http status for if payment is approved or not

      • payByNetBanking

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'Role.STUDENT\')")
@RequestMapping(produces="application/json",
                method=PUT,
                value="/pay/net-banking/{courseRegistrationId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity payByNetBanking​(@RequestBody
                                                               NetBankingDTO netBankingDTO,
                                                               @PathVariable
                                                               java.lang.Integer courseRegistrationId)
        This Api is used to make payment using NetBanking
        Parameters:
        netBankingDTO - net banking details to be entered by client
        courseRegistrationId - id from registered courses to pay the bill of student
        Returns:
        Response message and Http status for if payment is approved or not

      • payByUPI

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'Role.STUDENT\')")
@RequestMapping(produces="application/json",
                method=PUT,
                value="/pay/upi/{courseRegistrationId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity payByUPI​(@RequestBody
                                                        UPIDTO upiDTO,
                                                        @PathVariable
                                                        java.lang.Integer courseRegistrationId)
        This Api is used to make payment using Upi
        Parameters:
        upiDTO - UPI details to be entered by client
        courseRegistrationId - id from registered courses to pay the bill of student
        Returns:
        Response message and Http status for if payment is approved or not
